tr_quotes.quote: Her düştüğünde yerden bir şeyi kaldır.
tr_quotes.author: Oswald Avery

tr_quotes.quote: Her yeni gün, hayatınızı değiştirmek için ayrı bir fırsattır.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Her insanın hayatında kaçmakla direnmek arasında bir seçim yapmaya zorlandığı anlar vardır. Ben direniyorum.
tr_quotes.author: Charles Bukowski

tr_quotes.quote: Asla, kış mevsiminde bir ağacı kökünden kesme. Moralin bozukken olumsuz kararlar verme. Bekle… Sabret… Fırtına geçer… Yine bahar gelir!
tr_quotes.author: Robert Schuller

tr_quotes.quote: Direnme gücü; dünya ‘evet’ sözcüğünü duymak istediğinde, ‘hayır’ diyebilme yetisidir.
tr_quotes.author: Erich Fromm

tr_quotes.quote: Unutma, yokuş aşağı inmek kolaydır; ama manzara tepeden seyredilir.
tr_quotes.author: Dan Brown

tr_quotes.quote: Taş olsam yandım idi. Toprak olduk da dayandım.
tr_quotes.author: Aşık Veysel Şatıroğlu

tr_quotes.quote: Sus gönlüm! Bütün bu susmalarına karşılık her şeyin hayırlısının olacağına inanarak sus.
tr_quotes.author: Mevlana

tr_quotes.quote: Yoldaki bir tepecik seni bunaltmış; oysa önünde yüzlerce dağ var.
tr_quotes.author: Mevlana

tr_quotes.quote: Bir acı, sonuna kadar yaşanmadıkça geçmez.
tr_quotes.author: Marcel Proust

tr_quotes.quote: Hepimizde, başkalarının derlerine dayanacak kadar güç vardır.
tr_quotes.author: Montesquieu

tr_quotes.quote: Bir başka insana verebileceğiniz en büyük hediye, dayanma gücüdür.
tr_quotes.author: Caroline Myss

tr_quotes.quote: Acı sizi daha güçlü, korku sizi daha cesur ve kalp kırıklığı ise sizi daha bilge yapar.
tr_quotes.author: Drake

tr_quotes.quote: Yumuşaklık ve kibarlık, zayıflık ve ümitsizliğin işaretleri değil, gücün ve kararlılığın ifadesidir.
tr_quotes.author: Halil Cibran

tr_quotes.quote: Eğer koyu bir karanlığın içindeyseniz, tüm yapabileceğiniz, gözleriniz karanlığa alışana dek öylece oturmaktır.
tr_quotes.author: Haruki Murakami

tr_quotes.quote: Bir insan, asla kırıldığı zamanki kadar çok güçlü değildir.
tr_quotes.author: Hazrat Inayat Khan

tr_quotes.quote: Eğer merkezi bulursanız, hiçbir şey sizi olduğunuz yerden hareket ettiremez.
tr_quotes.author: Vivekananda

tr_quotes.quote: İradenin büyüdüğü yerde, zorluklar küçülür.
tr_quotes.author: Niccolò Machiavelli

tr_quotes.quote: Büyük sevinçlere büyük zahmetlere katlanarak ulaşılır.
tr_quotes.author: Goethe

tr_quotes.quote: Zalim iktidarları sınırlayan şey, kendilerine karşı gelenlerin dayanıklılığıdır.
tr_quotes.author: Frederick Douglass

tr_quotes.quote: Keyif zaferde değil; asıl mücadele, girişim ve çekilen ıstıraptadır.
tr_quotes.author: Gandhi

tr_quotes.quote: Zihinsel dayanıklılık, başarı için gereklidir.
tr_quotes.author: Vince Lombardi

tr_quotes.quote: Sabır, çekilen şeyi duymamak değil, ona dayanmayı bilmektir
tr_quotes.author: Necip Fazıl Kısakürek

tr_quotes.quote: Susmak, dayanılması çok güç bir cevaptır.
tr_quotes.author: Chesterton

tr_quotes.quote: En dayanıklı şeyler kişisel özelliklerdir.
tr_quotes.author: Walt Whitman

tr_quotes.quote: Karşı koyduğumuz cazibenin gücünü kazanırız.
tr_quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

tr_quotes.quote: Çaresiz olmadığımızı anımsamak yararlıdır, her zaman yapabileceğimiz bir şeyler vardır.
tr_quotes.author: Carla Gorrell

tr_quotes.quote: Zorlu zamanlar asla geçmez; ama zorlu insanlar bunu geçirir.
tr_quotes.author: Robert Schuller

tr_quotes.quote: Bir işi en zor yanından düşün ki yaparken güçlük çekmeyesin.
tr_quotes.author: Samuel Johnson

tr_quotes.quote: Kendisi ile mücadele eden insan, en değerli insandır.
tr_quotes.author: R.Browning

tr_quotes.quote: Bir defa değil, yüzlerce defa yenilseniz de mücadeleyi bırakmayınız.
tr_quotes.author: George Washington

tr_quotes.quote: Karşınıza bir zorluk çıktı mı, şikâyet etmeyin, bilakis Allah’a şükredin. Çünkü size zekânızı işletmek, güç ve kuvvetinizi göstermek fırsatını vermiştir.
tr_quotes.author: Gassion

tr_quotes.quote: Direnme gücü; dünya ‘evet’ sözcüğünü duymak istediğinde, ‘hayır’ diyebilme yetisidir.
tr_quotes.author: Erich Fromm

tr_quotes.quote: Unutma, yokuş aşağı inmek kolaydır; ama manzara tepeden seyredilir.
tr_quotes.author: Dan Brown

tr_quotes.quote: Kişi sevgi içindeyken, başka zamanlarda dayanabileceğinden çok daha fazlasına dayanır, her şeye katlanır.
tr_quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

tr_quotes.quote: Okyanusu geçmek için, dalgaları ilk önce karşına, sonra da arkana alacaksın… Dalgaların altındayken nefes tutmasını, üstündeyken nefes kesmesini bileceksin.
tr_quotes.author: Tayfun Topaloğlu

tr_quotes.quote: Herkes kolayca çöker. Önemli olan direnebilmektir.
tr_quotes.author: John Steinbeck

tr_quotes.quote: Her şeyin ta tepesine çıkmak iyi şeydir; ama tepeler ıssızdır, soğuktur, ebedi karlarla kaplıdır.
tr_quotes.author: André Maurois

tr_quotes.quote: Everest Dağı’nın zirvesi veya kariyerinin zirvesi olsun; zirveye tırmanmak kuvvet gerektiriyor.
tr_quotes.author: Abdul Kalam

tr_quotes.quote: Rüzgar esmezse, saman buğdaydan ayrılmaz.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Büyük insanlar, hiç yakınmadan bütün acılara katlanırlar.
tr_quotes.author: Friedrich Schiller

tr_quotes.quote: Ben sana denize açılma demiyorum. Açılacak olursan tufana bile katlan diyorum.
tr_quotes.author: Sadi Şirazi

tr_quotes.quote: Hepimizde, başkalarının dertlerine dayanacak kadar güç vardır.
tr_quotes.author: Montesquieu

tr_quotes.quote: Tanrının bana taşıyamayacağım bir yükü yollamayacağını biliyorum. Sadece bana bu kadar güvenmeseydi diyorum.
tr_quotes.author: Rahibe Teresa

tr_quotes.quote: İnsanın en zorlu düşmanı, kendi zayıflığıdır.
tr_quotes.author: Platon

tr_quotes.quote: Ancak kış geldiğinde, soğuklar bastırdığında, çam ve selvinin sonuna dek direndiğini görürsün.
tr_quotes.author: Konfüçyüs

tr_quotes.quote: Birisi seni ağır şekilde yaralayana kadar, kendi gücünü asla bilemezsin.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Sabırlı ve dayanıklı ol. Bir gün bu acı senin için yararlı olacak.
tr_quotes.author: Ovidius

tr_quotes.quote: Acı sizi daha güçlü, korku sizi daha cesur ve kalp kırıklığı ise sizi daha bilge yapar.
tr_quotes.author: Drake

tr_quotes.quote: Bir insan, asla kırıldığı zamanki kadar çok güçlü değildir.
tr_quotes.author: Hazrat Inayat Khan

tr_quotes.quote: Büyük sevinçlere büyük zahmetlere katlanarak ulaşılır.
tr_quotes.author: Goethe

tr_quotes.quote: Zalim iktidarları sınırlayan şey, kendilerine karşı gelenlerin dayanıklılığıdır.
tr_quotes.author: Frederick Douglass

tr_quotes.quote: Ne kadar güçlü olduğunu, ancak zorluklarla karşılaştığında anlayabilirsin…
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Bazen bir şeyleri oluruna bırakmak, onlara sarılmaya, uğraşmaya göre kat kat daha güçlü bir eylemdir.
tr_quotes.author: Eckhart Tolle

tr_quotes.quote: Susmak, dayanılması çok güç bir cevaptır.
tr_quotes.author: G. K. Chesterton

tr_quotes.quote: Toprak gibi olmalısın! Ezildikçe sertleşmelisin! Seni ezenler sana muhtaç kalmalı! Hayatı sende bulmalı.
tr_quotes.author: Can Yücel

tr_quotes.quote: Hayatta kaldım; çünkü içimdeki ateş beni çevreleyen ateşten daha kuvvetli yandı
tr_quotes.author: Joshua Graham

tr_quotes.quote: Kaybetmekten korkma; bir şeyi kazanman için bazı şeyleri kaybetmelisin. Ve unutma; Kaybettiğinde değil, vazgeçtiğinde yenilirsin.
tr_quotes.author: Che Guevara

tr_quotes.quote: Eğer bir amaç uğruna ayakta değilseniz, her darbe sizi yere serebilir.
tr_quotes.author: Malcolm X

tr_quotes.quote: Ayakta kalamıyorsan, hayatta kalmaya çalış.. bir gün tekrar ayağa kalkabilmek için!
tr_quotes.author: Tayfun Topaloğlu

tr_quotes.quote: Dayanıklılık kederin özgür ahbabıdır ve sabır onun efendisidir.
tr_quotes.author: Helena P. Blavatsky

tr_quotes.quote: Acıya dayanma gücü yetinmenin büyüklüğüyle paralel gider.
tr_quotes.author: Tahir Musa Ceylan

tr_quotes.quote: Güç insanın ruhundadır, kaslarında değil.
tr_quotes.author: Alex Karras

tr_quotes.quote: Yaşamınızı korkusuzca yaşayın, zorlukların tümüne göğüs gerin ve onların üstesinden gelebileceğinizi açıkça gösterin.
tr_quotes.author: André Gide

tr_quotes.quote: Kimsenin ıstırabı, olması gerektiğinden fazla değildir.
tr_quotes.author: Charles Bukoswski

tr_quotes.quote: Sonunda acı getirecek zevklerden kaçınabilen, sonunda zevk getirecek acılara da dayanabilen insan mutlu ve başarılıdır.
tr_quotes.author: Montaigne

tr_quotes.quote: İnsan iradesi bilinen tüm silahlardan daha güçlüdür.
tr_quotes.author: Dalai Lama

tr_quotes.quote: İnancının ölçüsü, katlanabildiğin acılardır.
tr_quotes.author: Dan Brown

tr_quotes.quote: Asla geri çekilme. Asla açıklama getirme. İşini yap ve bırak görsünler.
tr_quotes.author: Benjamin Jowett

tr_quotes.quote: Başarılı girişimcilerle başarısız girişimcileri birbirinden ayıran şeylerin yarısının sadece sabır olduğunu gördüm.
tr_quotes.author: Steve Jobs

tr_quotes.quote: Sakin kalmayı öğrendiğinizde, gerçekten sakin kalıp hayatın akışına izin verdiğinizde, parlayacaksınız.
tr_quotes.author: Morgan Freeman

tr_quotes.quote: Yaradan size her şeye dayanabilecek bir vücut verdi. İkna etmeniz gereken zihninizdir.
tr_quotes.author: Vince Lombardi

tr_quotes.quote: Eğer önünüzdeki yol tertemizse, büyük ihtimalle bir başkasının yolundasınızdır.
tr_quotes.author: Joseph Campbell

tr_quotes.quote: Dirençlilik, korkunç olaylar ve durumlar karşısında yine de kendinizi geliştirebilmektir.
tr_quotes.author: Boris Cyrulnik

tr_quotes.quote: Çabalar acı vermeye başladığında kendisini zorlamaya devam edebilen adam, kazanacak adamdır.
tr_quotes.author: Roger Bannister

tr_quotes.quote: Dayan ve üstele… Bu acı, adım adım senin iyiliğine dönüşecek.
tr_quotes.author: Ovidius

tr_quotes.quote: Dünyada insana yardım eden şey rastlantı değil, azim ve sebattır.
tr_quotes.author: Samuel Smiles

tr_quotes.quote: Asla vazgeçmeyin! Yüzüstü yere serilseniz bile, hala ileriye doğru hareket ediyorsunuz demektir.
tr_quotes.author: Victor Kiam

tr_quotes.quote: Fırtınalar insanların denizi sevmesine engel olamaz.
tr_quotes.author: André Maurois

tr_quotes.quote: Düşündüğünüz, inandığınız ve güvenle beklediğiniz her şey mutlaka gerçekleşir.
tr_quotes.author: Jack E. Addington

tr_quotes.quote: Seni öldürmeyen şey, seni güçlü kılar!
tr_quotes.author: Nietzsche

tr_quotes.quote: Kötü bir döneme girdiğinde ve her şey sana karşı gibi göründüğünde, bir dakika bile dayanamayacakmışsın gibi geldiğinde, sakın pes etme! Çünkü işte orası, gidişatın değişeceği yer ve zamandır.
tr_quotes.author: Mevlana

tr_quotes.quote: Dayanmak, kaderi yenmektir.
tr_quotes.author: Thomas Campbell

en_quotes.quote: With the new day comes new strength and new thoughts
en_quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

en_quotes.quote: The real man smiles in trouble, gathers strength from distress, and grows brave by reflection
en_quotes.author: Thomas Paine

en_quotes.quote: A truly strong person does not need the approval of others any more than a lion needs the approval of sheep
en_quotes.author: Vernon Howard

en_quotes.quote: My emotions are usually my weakness, but they are my strength while acting
en_quotes.author: Amruta Khanvilkar

en_quotes.quote: Being glamorous is about strength and confidence. It's black and white - dramatic. You have to be strong
en_quotes.author: Catherine Zeta-Jones

en_quotes.quote: Discipline and united action are the real source of strength for the nation
en_quotes.author: Lal Bahadur Shastri

en_quotes.quote: Unity is strength... when there is teamwork and collaboration, wonderful things can be achieved
en_quotes.author: Mattie Stepanek

en_quotes.quote: No one saves us but ourselves. No one can and no one may. We ourselves must walk the path
en_quotes.author: Buddha

en_quotes.quote: Strength and growth come only through continuous effort and struggle
en_quotes.author: Napoleon Hill

en_quotes.quote: Calm mind brings inner strength and self-confidence, so that's very important for good health
en_quotes.author: Dalai Lama

en_quotes.quote: The strong man is the one who is able to intercept at will the communication between the senses and the mind
en_quotes.author: Napoleon Bonaparte

en_quotes.quote: The man who is swimming against the stream knows the strength of it
en_quotes.author: Woodrow Wilson

en_quotes.quote: The world breaks everyone, and afterward, some are strong at the broken places
en_quotes.author: Ernest Hemingway

en_quotes.quote: The world is the great gymnasium where we come to make ourselves strong
en_quotes.author: Swami Vivekananda

en_quotes.quote: It takes so much strength to say to your ego, 'You know what? You're going to keep me lonely, so I have to ignore you.'
en_quotes.author: George Michael

en_quotes.quote: Great works are performed not by strength but by perseverance
en_quotes.author: Samuel Johnson

en_quotes.quote: Be sure you put your feet in the right place, then stand firm
en_quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

en_quotes.quote: The strength of a nation derives from the integrity of the home
en_quotes.author: Confucius

en_quotes.quote: Women are like teabags. We don't know our true strength until we are in hot water!
en_quotes.author: Unknown

en_quotes.quote: Climbing to the top demands strength, whether it is to the top of Mount Everest or to the top of your career
en_quotes.author: A. P. J. Abdul Kalam

en_quotes.quote: My greatest strength is common sense. I'm really a standard brand - like Campbell's tomato soup or Baker's chocolate
en_quotes.author: Katharine Hepburn

en_quotes.quote: The men who learn endurance, are they who call the whole world, brother
en_quotes.author: Charles Dickens

en_quotes.quote: Joy is prayer; joy is strength: joy is love; joy is a net of love by which you can catch souls
en_quotes.author: Mother Teresa

en_quotes.quote: Our diversity is our strength. What a dull and pointless life it would be if everyone was the same
en_quotes.author: Angelina Jolie

en_quotes.quote: The strength of brand loyalty begins with how your product makes people feel
en_quotes.author: Jay Samit

en_quotes.quote: Mastering others is strength. Mastering yourself is true power
en_quotes.author: Lao Tzu

en_quotes.quote: Remember, the storm is a good opportunity for the pine and the cypress to show their strength and their stability
en_quotes.author: Ho Chi Minh

en_quotes.quote: When you're playing upside down, it takes twice the strength
en_quotes.author: Tommy Lee

en_quotes.quote: Every good citizen adds to the strength of a nation
en_quotes.author: Gordon B. Hinckley

en_quotes.quote: Fortitude is the marshal of thought, the armor of the will, and the fort of reason
en_quotes.author: Francis Bacon

en_quotes.quote: Anxiety does not empty tomorrow of its sorrows, but only empties today of its strength
en_quotes.author: Charles Spurgeon

en_quotes.quote: Social media is reducing social barriers. It connects people on the strength of human values, not identities
en_quotes.author: Narendra Modi

en_quotes.quote: One who gains strength by overcoming obstacles possesses the only strength which can overcome adversity
en_quotes.author: Albert Schweitzer

en_quotes.quote: Nothing is so strong as gentleness, nothing so gentle as real strength
en_quotes.author: Saint Francis de Sales

en_quotes.quote: Kites rise highest against the wind - not with it
en_quotes.author: Winston Churchill

en_quotes.quote: Endurance is not just the ability to bear a hard thing, but to turn it into glory
en_quotes.author: William Barclay

en_quotes.quote: I think a hero is an ordinary individual who finds strength to persevere and endure in spite of overwhelming obstacles
en_quotes.author: Christopher Reeve

en_quotes.quote: Sometimes the strength of motherhood is greater than natural laws
en_quotes.author: Barbara Kingsolver

en_quotes.quote: Only the weak are cruel. Gentleness can only be expected from the strong
en_quotes.author: Leo Buscaglia

en_quotes.quote: Faith gives you an inner strength and a sense of balance and perspective in life
en_quotes.author: Gregory Peck

en_quotes.quote: Silence is a source of great strength
en_quotes.author: Lao Tzu

en_quotes.quote: In all my perplexities and distresses, the Bible has never failed to give me light and strength
en_quotes.author: Robert E. Lee

en_quotes.quote: Only strength can cooperate. Weakness can only beg
en_quotes.author: Dwight D. Eisenhower

en_quotes.quote: When restraint and courtesy are added to strength, the latter becomes irresistible
en_quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

en_quotes.quote: There is an invisible strength within us; when it recognizes two opposing objects of desire, it grows stronger
en_quotes.author: Rumi

en_quotes.quote: Thank you to all for your prayers and good wishes. It gave me the strength to persevere and warmed my heart
en_quotes.author: Steven Cojocaru

en_quotes.quote: It takes strength to be kind; it's not a weakness
en_quotes.author: Daniel Lubetzky

en_quotes.quote: It takes strength to make your way through grief, to grab hold of life and let it pull you forward
en_quotes.author: Patti Davis

en_quotes.quote: My fitness instructor helped me with strength training, muscle building, and toning
en_quotes.author: Karan Patel

en_quotes.quote: The strength of a civilization is not measured by its ability to fight wars, but rather by its ability to prevent them
en_quotes.author: Gene Roddenberry

en_quotes.quote: True strength lies in submission which permits one to dedicate his life, through devotion, to something beyond himself
en_quotes.author: Henry Miller

en_quotes.quote: Disappointment builds character and strength
en_quotes.author: Nafessa Williams

en_quotes.quote: Dealing with depression effectively is a mark not of weakness, but of strength
en_quotes.author: Andrew Solomon

en_quotes.quote: The strength of the vampire is that people will not believe in him
en_quotes.author: Garrett Fort

en_quotes.quote: The spirit of man is more important than mere physical strength, and the spiritual fiber of a nation than its wealth
en_quotes.author: Dwight D. Eisenhower

en_quotes.quote: The undertaking of a new action brings new strength
en_quotes.author: Richard L. Evans

en_quotes.quote: Heroism is endurance for one moment more
en_quotes.author: George F. Kennan

en_quotes.quote: I realized that my strength was being different
en_quotes.author: Betsey Johnson

en_quotes.quote: It's never too late to reclaim your inner diva and reclaim your inner strength
en_quotes.author: Michelle Visage

en_quotes.quote: Shallow men believe in luck. Strong men believe in cause and effect
en_quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

en_quotes.quote: Sure I am of this, that you have only to endure to conquer
en_quotes.author: Winston Churchill

en_quotes.quote: Power is so characteristically calm, that calmness in itself has the aspect of strength
en_quotes.author: Edward G. Bulwer-Lytton

en_quotes.quote: Strength lies in differences, not in similarities
en_quotes.author: Stephen Covey

en_quotes.quote: Sometimes your greatest strength can emerge as a weakness if the context changes
en_quotes.author: Harsha Bhogle

en_quotes.quote: I'm very proud of my heritage and the blood that runs through my veins. I take a lot of strength from that
en_quotes.author: Robert Whittaker

en_quotes.quote: You have been chosen, and you must therefore use such strength and heart and wits as you have
en_quotes.author: J. R. R. Tolkien

en_quotes.quote: Running up a steep hill or up steps are fantastic ways of building explosive strength
en_quotes.author: Greg Rutherford

en_quotes.quote: There are dark shadows on the earth, but its lights are stronger in the contrast
en_quotes.author: Charles Dickens

en_quotes.quote: Strength does not have to be belligerent and loud
en_quotes.author: Russell Brand

en_quotes.quote: It does not take much strength to do things, but it requires great strength to decide on what to do
en_quotes.author: Elbert Hubbard

en_quotes.quote: As long as we persevere and endure, we can get anything we want
en_quotes.author: Mike Tyson

en_quotes.quote: A champion's strength comes from never being contented
en_quotes.author: Stephan El Shaarawy

en_quotes.quote: Tolerance is a virtue that depends upon peace and strength
en_quotes.author: Charles Lindbergh

en_quotes.quote: Fortitude is the guard and support of the other virtues
en_quotes.author: John Locke

en_quotes.quote: It is only necessary to have courage, for strength without self-confidence is useless
en_quotes.author: Giacomo Casanova

en_quotes.quote: Life asks not merely what you can do; it asks how much can you endure and not be spoiled
en_quotes.author: Harry Emerson Fosdick

en_quotes.quote: If you would know strength and patience, welcome the company of trees
en_quotes.author: Hal Borland

en_quotes.quote: He who conquers others is strong; He who conquers himself is mighty
en_quotes.author: Lao Tzu

en_quotes.quote: Physical strength can never permanently withstand the impact of spiritual force
en_quotes.author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

en_quotes.quote: There is strength in numbers, but organizing those numbers is one of the great challenges
en_quotes.author: John C. Mather

en_quotes.quote: The strength and power of despotism consists wholly in the fear of resistance
en_quotes.author: Thomas Paine

en_quotes.quote: Women may fall when there's no strength in men
en_quotes.author: William Shakespeare

en_quotes.quote: In solitude the mind gains strength and learns to lean upon itself
en_quotes.author: Laurence Sterne

en_quotes.quote: We acquire the strength we have overcome
en_quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

en_quotes.quote: If I didn't define myself for myself, I would be crunched into other people's fantasies for me and eaten alive
en_quotes.author: Audre Lorde

en_quotes.quote: This is the mark of a really admirable man: steadfastness in the face of trouble
en_quotes.author: Ludwig van Beethoven

en_quotes.quote: It is my own firm belief that the strength of the soul grows in proportion as you subdue the flesh
en_quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

en_quotes.quote: Life is very interesting... in the end, some of your greatest pains, become your greatest strengths
en_quotes.author: Drew Barrymore

en_quotes.quote: A single twig breaks, but the bundle of twigs is strong
en_quotes.author: Tecumseh

en_quotes.quote: You don't have to be a bodybuilder to have strength in your muscles
en_quotes.author: Katarina Johnson-Thompson

en_quotes.quote: Religion is an illusion and it derives its strength from the fact that it falls in with our instinctual desires
en_quotes.author: Sigmund Freud

en_quotes.quote: Don't expect to build up the weak by pulling down the strong
en_quotes.author: Calvin Coolidge

en_quotes.quote: The soul that is within me no man can degrade
en_quotes.author: Frederick Douglass

en_quotes.quote: I gain strength out of familiar surroundings
en_quotes.author: Fedor Emelianenko

en_quotes.quote: If one suffers we all suffer. Togetherness is strength. Courage
en_quotes.author: Jean-Bertrand Aristide

en_quotes.quote: Life is truly known only to those who suffer, lose, endure adversity and stumble from defeat to defeat
en_quotes.author: Anais Nin

en_quotes.quote: When I use my strength in the service of my vision it makes no difference whether or not I am afraid
en_quotes.author: Audre Lorde

en_quotes.quote: Scar tissue is stronger than regular tissue. Realize the strength, move on
en_quotes.author: Henry Rollins

en_quotes.quote: My strength and my weakness are twins in the same womb
en_quotes.author: Marge Piercy

en_quotes.quote: Nobody picks on a strong man
en_quotes.author: Charles Atlas

en_quotes.quote: Power over others is weakness disguised as strength
en_quotes.author: Eckhart Tolle

en_quotes.quote: As long as I have health and strength, I will gladly work all my days
en_quotes.author: Frederic Chopin

en_quotes.quote: I'm coming from a place of total strength and humility now
en_quotes.author: Robert Downey, Jr.

en_quotes.quote: The awareness of our own strength makes us modest
en_quotes.author: Paul Cezanne

en_quotes.quote: Endurance is nobler than strength, and patience than beauty
en_quotes.author: John Ruskin

en_quotes.quote: Good composition is like a suspension bridge - each line adds strength and takes none away
en_quotes.author: Robert Henri

en_quotes.quote: The sea heaves up, hangs loaded o'er the land, Breaks there, and buries its tumultuous strength
en_quotes.author: Robert Browning

en_quotes.quote: War is peace. Freedom is slavery. Ignorance is strength
en_quotes.author: George Orwell

en_quotes.quote: Life only demands from you the strength that you possess. Only one feat is possible; not to run away
en_quotes.author: Dag Hammarskjold

en_quotes.quote: Strong and bitter words indicate a weak cause
en_quotes.author: Victor Hugo

en_quotes.quote: For my first fragrance, I wanted to capture the essence of a woman's strength and beauty
en_quotes.author: Ivanka Trump

en_quotes.quote: My bad habits aren't my title. My strengths and my talent are my title
en_quotes.author: Layne Staley

en_quotes.quote: When strength is yoked with justice, where is a mightier pair than they?
en_quotes.author: Aeschylus

en_quotes.quote: Not one man in a thousand has the strength of mind or the goodness of heart to be an atheist
en_quotes.author: Samuel Taylor Coleridge

en_quotes.quote: I kid around a lot, but pranks are not my best strength!
en_quotes.author: Betty White

en_quotes.quote: I believe in blood, soil, and honour; family, homeland, and hamingja; strength, traditions, and courage
en_quotes.author: Varg Vikernes

en_quotes.quote: My strength was that I am more balanced and calmer than most other riders
en_quotes.author: Miguel Indurain

en_quotes.quote: Being a great horseman does not rely on physical strength but more on the mind and sensibility
en_quotes.author: Charlotte Casiraghi

en_quotes.quote: My mother was the dearest, sweetest angel. She didn't talk; she sang. She was a tower of strength
en_quotes.author: Jayne Meadows

en_quotes.quote: Both now and for always, I intend to hold fast to my belief in the hidden strength of the human spirit
en_quotes.author: Andrei Sakharov

en_quotes.quote: The wisest use of American strength is to advance freedom
en_quotes.author: George W. Bush

en_quotes.quote: Yoga is equal parts strength, flexibility, balance, and endurance
en_quotes.author: Mandy Ingber

en_quotes.quote: I learned that it is the weak who are cruel, and that gentleness is to be expected only from the strong
en_quotes.author: Leo Rosten

en_quotes.quote: The strength of criticism lies in the weakness of the thing criticized
en_quotes.author: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow

en_quotes.quote: Endure and persist; this pain will turn to good by and by
en_quotes.author: Ovid

en_quotes.quote: A strength to harm is perilous in the hand of an ambitious head
en_quotes.author: Elizabeth I

en_quotes.quote: I bring a lot of energy and passion to what I do. Plus, I've had some weird feats of superhuman strength!
en_quotes.author: John Cena

en_quotes.quote: Each relationship nurtures a strength or weakness within you
en_quotes.author: Mike Murdock

en_quotes.quote: Physical strength in a woman - that's what I am
en_quotes.author: Tina Turner

en_quotes.quote: We must keep both our femininity and our strength
en_quotes.author: Indra Devi

en_quotes.quote: In the end, long life is the reward, strength, and beauty
en_quotes.author: Grace Paley

en_quotes.quote: The strength of any weakness within us is the degree to which it is feared
en_quotes.author: Guy Finley

en_quotes.quote: Force has no place where there is need of skill
en_quotes.author: Herodotus

en_quotes.quote: When people are depending on us, we end up finding strength we didn't know we had
en_quotes.author: Adam Grant

en_quotes.quote: I've been doing a lot of deadlifting and squatting for overall strength
en_quotes.author: Jesse Lee Soffer

en_quotes.quote: We draw our strength from the very despair in which we have been forced to live. We shall endure
en_quotes.author: Cesar Chavez

en_quotes.quote: I know and I've always felt for Canada that we recognize that diversity is a great source of strength
en_quotes.author: Justin Trudeau

en_quotes.quote: My greatest strength as a consultant is to be ignorant and ask a few questions
en_quotes.author: Peter Drucker

en_quotes.quote: Rudeness is a weak imitation of strength
en_quotes.author: Eric Hoffer

en_quotes.quote: Believing in yourself and having confidence gives you outer strength
en_quotes.author: Nikki Bella

en_quotes.quote: Where there is no struggle, there is no strength
en_quotes.author: Oprah Winfrey

en_quotes.quote: Problems are not the problem; coping is the problem
en_quotes.author: Virginia Satir

en_quotes.quote: Continuous effort - not strength or intelligence - is the key to unlocking our potential
en_quotes.author: Liane Cordes

en_quotes.quote: A mind at peace, a mind centered and not focused on harming others, is stronger than any physical force in the universe
en_quotes.author: Wayne Dyer

en_quotes.quote: The five separate fingers are five independent units. Close them and the fist multiplies strength. This is organization
en_quotes.author: James Cash Penney

en_quotes.quote: I have always drawn strength from being close to home
en_quotes.author: Arthur Ashe

en_quotes.quote: We need a president with tremendous intelligence, smarts, cunning, strength and stamina
en_quotes.author: Donald Trump

en_quotes.quote: It doesn't take a lot of strength to hang on. It takes a lot of strength to let go
en_quotes.author: J. C. Watts

en_quotes.quote: Good actions give strength to ourselves and inspire good actions in others
en_quotes.author: Samuel Smiles

en_quotes.quote: The strength of a man's virtue should not be measured by his special exertions, but by his habitual acts
en_quotes.author: Blaise Pascal

en_quotes.quote: Strength of mind rests in sobriety; for this keeps your reason unclouded by passion
en_quotes.author: Pythagoras

en_quotes.quote: I like criticism. It makes you strong
en_quotes.author: LeBron James

en_quotes.quote: If you learn how to forgive others for not being strong, then people can learn how to forgive you for your own issues
en_quotes.author: T. D. Jakes

en_quotes.quote: America's greatest strength has always been its hopeful vision of human progress
en_quotes.author: John McCain

en_quotes.quote: Military preparedness is absolutely a form of strength
en_quotes.author: Rachel Maddow

en_quotes.quote: The true measure of strength is through a squat and deadlift
en_quotes.author: Mark Henry

en_quotes.quote: Every calamity is to be overcome by endurance
en_quotes.author: Virgil

en_quotes.quote: Being vulnerable is not a sign of weakness. It's a sign of strength
en_quotes.author: Karamo Brown

en_quotes.quote: We - we need strength, we need energy, we need quickness and we need brain in this country to turn it around
en_quotes.author: Donald Trump

en_quotes.quote: There is a growing strength in women but it's in the forehead, not the forearm
en_quotes.author: Beverly Sills

en_quotes.quote: You can't really be strong until you see a funny side to things
en_quotes.author: Ken Kesey

en_quotes.quote: Where is the man who has the strength to be true, and to show himself as he is?
en_quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

en_quotes.quote: The spirit of man can endure only so much and when it is broken only a miracle can mend it
en_quotes.author: John Burroughs

en_quotes.quote: Only the gentle are ever really strong
en_quotes.author: James Dean

en_quotes.quote: Suppressed grief suffocates, it rages within the breast, and is forced to multiply its strength
en_quotes.author: Ovid

en_quotes.quote: Peace is purchased from strength. It's not purchased from weakness or unilateral retreats
en_quotes.author: Benjamin Netanyahu

en_quotes.quote: My strength is as the strength of ten, because my heart is pure
en_quotes.author: Alfred Lord Tennyson

en_quotes.quote: The colour of the skin is in no way connected with strength of the mind or intellectual powers
en_quotes.author: Benjamin Banneker

en_quotes.quote: Every burden is a blessing
en_quotes.author: Walt Kelly

en_quotes.quote: I think people who have good parents come into the world with a strength, yes, and an advantage
en_quotes.author: Oprah Winfrey

en_quotes.quote: God has always given me the strength to say what is right
en_quotes.author: Rosa Parks

en_quotes.quote: I know that, like every woman of the people, I have more strength than I appear to have
en_quotes.author: Evita Peron

en_quotes.quote: I like a women who's got some balls, some strength. As long as I can beat her at arm wrestling, that's fine
en_quotes.author: James Hetfield

en_quotes.quote: I gambled on having the strength to live two lives, one for myself and one for the world
en_quotes.author: Ruth Benedict

en_quotes.quote: The first movement ballerina should be a paradigm of strength and authority
en_quotes.author: Robert Gottlieb

en_quotes.quote: A nation' s strength ultimately consists in what it can do on its own, and not in what it can borrow from others
en_quotes.author: Indira Gandhi

en_quotes.quote: Peace is not the absence of war, but a virtue based on strength of character
en_quotes.author: Baruch Spinoza

en_quotes.quote: Living in America and, of course, just being women in general, we've got more strength than we think we do
en_quotes.author: Dolly Parton

en_quotes.quote: Building mental strength is the key to reaching our full potential in life
en_quotes.author: Amy Morin

en_quotes.quote: Perhaps I am stronger than I think
en_quotes.author: Thomas Merton

en_quotes.quote: I count life just a stuff to try the soul's strength on
en_quotes.author: Robert Browning

en_quotes.quote: And when a woman's will is as strong as the man's who wants to govern her, half her strength must be concealment
en_quotes.author: George Eliot

en_quotes.quote: I have the people behind me and the people are my strength
en_quotes.author: Huey Newton

en_quotes.quote: I was ironing my own clothes when I was 11 years old. My mental strength goes back to those days
en_quotes.author: Cristiano Ronaldo

en_quotes.quote: The strength and power of a country depends absolutely on the quantity of good men and women in it
en_quotes.author: John Ruskin

en_quotes.quote: Strengthen me by sympathizing with my strength, not my weakness
en_quotes.author: Amos Bronson Alcott

en_quotes.quote: When a tradition gathers enough strength to go on for centuries, you don't just turn it off one day
en_quotes.author: Chinua Achebe

en_quotes.quote: Picasso's sculpture has incredible strength combined with a lack of pomposity
en_quotes.author: Roy Lichtenstein

en_quotes.quote: Strength of character may be learned at work, but beauty of character is learned at home
en_quotes.author: Henry Drummond

en_quotes.quote: A man has to have sensibility, wit, mystery, tolerance, and strength... Romance also helps
en_quotes.author: Carolina Herrera

en_quotes.quote: Atheism shows strength of mind, but only to a certain degree
en_quotes.author: Blaise Pascal

en_quotes.quote: There's a strength to being able to look at products through a customer's eyes, but it is also dangerous
en_quotes.author: Francois-Henri Pinault

en_quotes.quote: As long as I feel that inner strength, I'll be all right
en_quotes.author: Vincent Kompany

en_quotes.quote: They say everything you go through in your childhood builds character and inner strength
en_quotes.author: Curtis Joseph

en_quotes.quote: You can tell the strength of a nation by the women behind its men
en_quotes.author: Benjamin Disraeli

en_quotes.quote: The lack of financial strength to avail healthcare is a major challenge
en_quotes.author: N. R. Narayana Murthy

en_quotes.quote: A powerful idea communicates some of its strength to him who challenges it
en_quotes.author: Marcel Proust

en_quotes.quote: People do not lack strength; they lack will
en_quotes.author: Victor Hugo

en_quotes.quote: My strength is that I'm an empath
en_quotes.author: Catriona Gray

en_quotes.quote: I've been through it all, baby, I'm mother courage
en_quotes.author: Elizabeth Taylor

en_quotes.quote: Even cowards can endure hardship; only the brave can endure suspense
en_quotes.author: Mignon McLaughlin

en_quotes.quote: He knows not his own strength that has not met adversity
en_quotes.author: Ben Jonson

en_quotes.quote: Who among us has the strength to oppose petty egoism, those petty good feelings, pity and remorse?
en_quotes.author: Ivan Turgenev

en_quotes.quote: When I make a fist, it's strong, and you can't tear it apart. As long as there's unity, there's strength
en_quotes.author: Ara Parseghian

en_quotes.quote: Victoria's Secret is really about celebrating women and what they stand for: the strength
en_quotes.author: Cara Delevingne

en_quotes.quote: You must rouse into people's consciousness their own prudence and strength, if you want to raise their character
en_quotes.author: Luc de Clapiers

en_quotes.quote: The very strength of a nation eventually proves to be its weakness
en_quotes.author: Paul P. Harris

en_quotes.quote: My intensity is my greatest strength. It's also my greatest weakness
en_quotes.author: Jeff Van Gundy

en_quotes.quote: Vladimir Putin is only going to respond to action, strength, and resolve. He's not going to respond to words
en_quotes.author: Ron Johnson

en_quotes.quote: The great and admirable strength of America consists in this, that America is truly the American people
en_quotes.author: Jacques Maritain

en_quotes.quote: True strength is delicate
en_quotes.author: Louise Berliawsky Nevelson

en_quotes.quote: Lauryn Hill. I admire her bravery and her strength. Hands down to the queen
en_quotes.author: Dinah Jane

en_quotes.quote: Virtue is an inner strength. It expands your nature
en_quotes.author: John Bradshaw

en_quotes.quote: One cannot weep for the entire world, it is beyond human strength. One must choose
en_quotes.author: Jean Anouilh

en_quotes.quote: Strength alone knows conflict, weakness is born vanquished
en_quotes.author: Sophie Swetchine

en_quotes.quote: If you have less weight, you have less strength
en_quotes.author: Ilya Ilyin

en_quotes.quote: Willingness to change is a strength, even if it means plunging part of the company into total confusion for a while
en_quotes.author: Jack Welch

en_quotes.quote: What is to give light must endure burning
en_quotes.author: Anton Wildgans

en_quotes.quote: I want my children to attend inclusive schools where diversity is respected and acknowledged as a sign of strength
en_quotes.author: Ilhan Omar

en_quotes.quote: Many a man's strength is in opposition, and when he faileth, he grows out of use
en_quotes.author: Francis Bacon

en_quotes.quote: If we resist our passions, it is more due to their weakness than our strength
en_quotes.author: Francois de La Rochefoucauld

en_quotes.quote: The Lord needed the strength of the women of this Church as the seeds of the Restoration were planted and nourished
en_quotes.author: Sheri L. Dew

en_quotes.quote: Sleep deprivation robs you of mental strength and impairs your ability to deal with stressful events
en_quotes.author: Amy Morin

en_quotes.quote: In the strength of the Lord we can do and endure and overcome all things
en_quotes.author: David A. Bednar

en_quotes.quote: My mom has always been so generous and so sensitive and so vulnerable and yet exudes so much strength
en_quotes.author: Justin Trudeau

en_quotes.quote: Our strength is often composed of the weakness that we're damned if we're going to show
en_quotes.author: Mignon McLaughlin

en_quotes.quote: I never won anything by myself. I was always strong because of help that gave me extra strength to win
en_quotes.author: Dan Gable

en_quotes.quote: I have two beautiful children. And they really are my strength
en_quotes.author: Terri Irwin

en_quotes.quote: Only actions give life strength; only moderation gives it charm
en_quotes.author: Jean Paul

en_quotes.quote: Our passion is our strength
en_quotes.author: Billie Joe Armstrong

en_quotes.quote: He knows not his own strength that hath not met adversity
en_quotes.author: Cesare Pavese

en_quotes.quote: Will power is only the tensile strength of one's own disposition. One cannot increase it by a single ounce
en_quotes.author: Cesare Pavese

en_quotes.quote: I have both English bulldog determination and Bengal tiger strength
en_quotes.author: Bikram Choudhury

en_quotes.quote: He is greatest whose strength carries up the most hearts by the attraction of his own
en_quotes.author: Henry Ward Beecher

en_quotes.quote: I know there is strength in the differences between us. I know there is comfort where we overlap
en_quotes.author: Ani DiFranco

en_quotes.quote: I was always looking outside myself for strength and confidence but it comes from within. It is there all the time
en_quotes.author: Anna Freud

en_quotes.quote: For me, my greatest weakness is also my greatest strength: I'm a complete overthinker about everything
en_quotes.author: Sasha Velour

en_quotes.quote: My parents, especially my mother, has been my pillar of strength
en_quotes.author: Sangram Singh

en_quotes.quote: I don't think a woman has to act like a man to show that she has strength
en_quotes.author: Little Richard

en_quotes.quote: It is not good to see people who have been pretending strength all their lives lose it even for a minute
en_quotes.author: Lillian Hellman

en_quotes.quote: I believe in prayer. It's the best way we have to draw strength from heaven
en_quotes.author: Josephine Baker

en_quotes.quote: If I had not some strength of will I would make a first class drunkard
en_quotes.author: Ernest Shackleton

en_quotes.quote: I haven't strength of mind not to need a career
en_quotes.author: Ruth Benedict

en_quotes.quote: It's empowering to find a workout that builds strength and grace
en_quotes.author: Mary Helen Bowers

en_quotes.quote: Darts players are probably a lot fitter than most footballers in overall body strength
en_quotes.author: Sid Waddell

en_quotes.quote: As thy days, so shall thy strength be which, in modern language, may be translated as thy thoughts so shall thy life be
en_quotes.author: Emmet Fox

en_quotes.quote: Evil is the moment when I lack the strength to be true to the Good that compels me
en_quotes.author: Alain Badiou

en_quotes.quote: We get strength and encouragement from watching children
en_quotes.author: Hayao Miyazaki

en_quotes.quote: Peace through strength works; but the flip side is war invited by weakness
en_quotes.author: Pete Hegseth

en_quotes.quote: Our manufacturing in India has grown with a lot of indigenous strength
en_quotes.author: Nirmala Sitharaman

en_quotes.quote: I was always fascinated by strength. Arnold was an idol of mine
en_quotes.author: Brock Lesnar

en_quotes.quote: I've always overworked in the weight room. I love working with weights. I knew they'd give me the strength I needed
en_quotes.author: Florence Griffith Joyner

en_quotes.quote: Thinking differently is my strength
en_quotes.author: Carine Roitfeld

en_quotes.quote: If I lift any weights, I do it more for explosion, but I really use my body weight to build up muscle and strength
en_quotes.author: Canelo Alvarez

en_quotes.quote: I'm lucky that my best strength as a wrestler has always been my brain
en_quotes.author: Kenny Omega

en_quotes.quote: My husband Rhashan reminds me of my father because he's got great strength of character
en_quotes.author: Olivia Williams

en_quotes.quote: I think leaders are incapable of the strength that passive resistance entails
en_quotes.author: Meshell Ndegeocello

en_quotes.quote: I don't walk around with fear. I walk around with strength. I believe in cause and effect
en_quotes.author: Melanie Griffith

en_quotes.quote: I have a theory and I really believe it. I think your worst weakness can become your greatest single strength
en_quotes.author: Barbara Corcoran

en_quotes.quote: A strong woman is a woman determined to do something others are determined not be done
en_quotes.author: Marge Piercy

en_quotes.quote: Peace comes through strength, not through retreat
en_quotes.author: Kevin McCarthy

en_quotes.quote: Strength doesn't mean an absence of pain
en_quotes.author: Aja Naomi King

en_quotes.quote: I find, in being black, a thing of beauty: a joy; a strength; a secret cup of gladness
en_quotes.author: Ossie Davis

en_quotes.quote: If you believe in something and have the strength not to give up, it can happen. I am the living proof it can be done
en_quotes.author: Samuel Eto'o

en_quotes.quote: I am not yet born; O fill me with strength against those who would freeze my humanity
en_quotes.author: Louis MacNeice

en_quotes.quote: I work in a hostile atmosphere, and my voters are the only strength I have
en_quotes.author: Jitin Prasada

en_quotes.quote: I think we women underrate ourselves when it comes to our courage and strength
en_quotes.author: Judith McNaught

en_quotes.quote: One has to have the strength of character to say the time has come to move on... unless you are a king
en_quotes.author: Kofi Annan

en_quotes.quote: I find it takes a lot of strength to endure myself
en_quotes.author: Henry Rollins

en_quotes.quote: We all have enough strength to endure the misfortunes of others
en_quotes.author: Francois de La Rochefoucauld

en_quotes.quote: Strength and compassion are not mutually exclusive
en_quotes.author: Robert Kiyosaki

en_quotes.quote: Each particular society begins to feel its strength, whence arises a state of war between different nations
en_quotes.author: Montesquieu

en_quotes.quote: I wish I was a gorgeous mixologist, but that was not my god-given strength
en_quotes.author: Jonathan Van Ness

en_quotes.quote: Have you not learned that strength comes to an ordinary soul when given an extraordinary calling?
en_quotes.author: Russell M. Nelson

en_quotes.quote: The transfer of power is always a test of the constitutional system, a test of its strength
en_quotes.author: Vladimir Putin

en_quotes.quote: The perfection of Christian character depends wholly upon the grace and strength found alone in God
en_quotes.author: Ellen G. White

en_quotes.quote: A nation will rise no higher than the strength of its homes
en_quotes.author: Gordon B. Hinckley

en_quotes.quote: Nothing has more strength than dire necessity
en_quotes.author: Euripides

en_quotes.quote: I'm not sure I have the physical strength to undertake a novel
en_quotes.author: Joan Didion

en_quotes.quote: I want people to draw strength from me
en_quotes.author: Mr. T

en_quotes.quote: Tis skill, not strength, that governs a ship
en_quotes.author: Thomas Fuller

en_quotes.quote: Empowering yourself is an essential component to building mental strength and creating the kind of life you want
en_quotes.author: Amy Morin

en_quotes.quote: Courage conquers all things: it even gives strength to the body
en_quotes.author: Ovid

en_quotes.quote: Tina Turner is someone that I admire, because she made her strength feminine and sexy
en_quotes.author: Beyonce Knowles

en_quotes.quote: I had always been proud of my body - its strength and grace enabled me to pursue my passions
en_quotes.author: Misty Copeland

en_quotes.quote: If I had to pick my greatest strength as a football coach, I say it would be innovation
en_quotes.author: Tom Landry

en_quotes.quote: On the world stage, Donald Trump will lead from strength
en_quotes.author: Mike Pence

en_quotes.quote: All women are the same, really: They are strong, but they are afraid of their own strength
en_quotes.author: Diane von Furstenberg

en_quotes.quote: There is always strength in numbers. The more individuals or organizations that you can rally to your cause, the better
en_quotes.author: Mark Shields

en_quotes.quote: I've been doing a lot of drama, but I feel like comedy is my strength
en_quotes.author: Taraji P. Henson

en_quotes.quote: Organized religion is a sham and a crutch for weak-minded people who need strength in numbers
en_quotes.author: Jesse Ventura

en_quotes.quote: Religion brings to man an inner strength, spiritual light, and ineffable peace
en_quotes.author: Alexis Carrel

en_quotes.quote: The strength people need to proceed along the path of human development can come only from the spiritual worlds
en_quotes.author: Rudolf Steiner

en_quotes.quote: Strength instead of being the lusty child of passion, grows by grappling with and subduing them
en_quotes.author: James M. Barrie

en_quotes.quote: Freedom and order are not incompatible... truth is strength... free discussion is the very life of truth
en_quotes.author: Thomas Huxley

en_quotes.quote: I get strength from my art - all the paintings I own are powerful
en_quotes.author: Madonna Ciccone

en_quotes.quote: My strength is translating emotion because I'm such a feeler
en_quotes.author: Selena Gomez

en_quotes.quote: One should have strength and courage to follow their own truth, speak their own language, fulfill their own dreams
en_quotes.author: Kerli

en_quotes.quote: The strength of America is not in Washington
en_quotes.author: J. C. Watts

en_quotes.quote: To be loved is a strength. To love is a weakness
en_quotes.author: Zsa Zsa Gabor

en_quotes.quote: I work out every day - and my daily routine is a mix of functional and strength training
en_quotes.author: Mahesh Babu

en_quotes.quote: There is little that can withstand a man who can conquer himself
en_quotes.author: Louis XIV

en_quotes.quote: Indian democracy's greatest strength is that we have always put the nation above politics
en_quotes.author: Atal Bihari Vajpayee

en_quotes.quote: I realized then that the generations may change but the strength of our nation remains solid
en_quotes.author: Jane D. Hull

en_quotes.quote: My strength would be my honesty and my passion towards my work
en_quotes.author: Sushant Singh Rajput

en_quotes.quote: Our biggest strength has always been the fans. All over, wherever we have gone, CSK has got support
en_quotes.author: MS Dhoni

en_quotes.quote: Patience is the support of weakness; impatience the ruin of strength
en_quotes.author: Charles Caleb Colton

en_quotes.quote: It takes a great deal of strength to be an optimist
en_quotes.author: Ruth Reichl

en_quotes.quote: Muhammad Ali was such an original - his antics, his character, his charisma, his strength, his individuality
en_quotes.author: Jon Jones

en_quotes.quote: What is important is to believe in something so strongly that you're never discouraged
en_quotes.author: Salma Hayek

en_quotes.quote: The mark of a truly civilized man is confidence in the strength and security derived from the inquiring mind
en_quotes.author: Felix Frankfurter

en_quotes.quote: I'm an activist for gay marriage equality and children's rights. I'm the face of Share Our Strength
en_quotes.author: Sandra Lee

en_quotes.quote: My family is my strength and my weakness
en_quotes.author: Aishwarya Rai Bachchan

en_quotes.quote: Britain's great strength is its innovative, design and engineering natural ability and we're not using it
en_quotes.author: James Dyson

en_quotes.quote: The biggest strength we have as Democrats is encouraging people to speak up about what is in their best interest
en_quotes.author: Valerie Jarrett

en_quotes.quote: Thankfully, I was given a strong base by my parents, an understanding of who I was and my strength
en_quotes.author: Kimberly Elise

en_quotes.quote: Where a man's strength and courage is tested most is in the way that he treats women - the way that he loves
en_quotes.author: John Eldredge

en_quotes.quote: Diversity of thought and culture and religion and ideas has been the strength of America
en_quotes.author: Gary Locke

en_quotes.quote: Insincerity is always weakness; sincerity even in error is strength
en_quotes.author: George Henry Lewes

en_quotes.quote: Fixing mistakes is one thing. Apple's bigger strength has been its ability to keep improving hit products
en_quotes.author: Daniel Lyons

en_quotes.quote: From the gut comes the strut, and where hunger reigns, strength abstains
en_quotes.author: Francois Rabelais

en_quotes.quote: I pretty much eat all day to keep my strength up. I'm primarily a vegetarian who has an occasional side of fish
en_quotes.author: Jaimie Alexander

en_quotes.quote: He knows not his own strength who hath not met adversity
en_quotes.author: William Samuel Johnson

en_quotes.quote: Women play a finesse game: a real pattern game as opposed to flash and dash, power and strength
en_quotes.author: Anne Donovan

en_quotes.quote: A lot of my strength came from my upbringing
en_quotes.author: Ruby Bridges

en_quotes.quote: At their core, when things really matter, people see a need to turn to God for strength and protection
en_quotes.author: Lee Greenwood

en_quotes.quote: Freedom comes from strength and self-reliance
en_quotes.author: Lisa Murkowski

en_quotes.quote: We also very importantly recommend continued growth in the Army and the Marine Corps end strength
en_quotes.author: John M. McHugh

en_quotes.quote: Humble souls are fearful of their own strength
en_quotes.author: William Gurnall

en_quotes.quote: I am climbing a difficult road; but the glory gives me strength
en_quotes.author: Sextus Propertius

en_quotes.quote: Sometimes your disappointments make you a stronger person for the future
en_quotes.author: Blanka Vlasic

en_quotes.quote: Our very strength as lesbians lies in the fact that we are outside of patriarchy; our existence challenges its life
en_quotes.author: Charlotte Bunch

en_quotes.quote: What gives me strength is thinking about my children
en_quotes.author: Ken Kercheval

en_quotes.quote: Strength is born in the deep silence of long-suffering hearts; not amid joy
en_quotes.author: Felicia Hemans
